GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:id.description: serves an object of the specified article

articles.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the votes of the article specified by ID
PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.requirements: an object containing a body that you want to update e.g. {inc_votes : 10} increases votes by 10

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments for specified article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to an article and returns that comment
POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.requirements: an object containing a username key value pair and a body containing your comment

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of objects showing all usernames

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object showing one user specified by the username

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates a comment with a new key-value pair and returns the updated comment
PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.requirements: an object containing a key value pair that you wish to add to the comment
